elements.title: Find 2 plausible reasons for the high demand for apartments in cities in major central regions.
elements.correctAnswer: Many jobs, wide range of cultural activities, good public transport connections, existing educational institutions (vocational schools, grammar schools, universities), wide range of leisure activities (sports grounds, fitness centers, music schools, youth clubs, etc.)
